attributes.additional_details: British.  On all government departments  forms,when asking about nationality, all refer to British.    This is correct for someone who may have legally emigrated to Great Britain, but is insulting to an indiginous English, Scottish or Welsh person.      It is used on electoral forms, police statements, DHSS, forms.etc.,  It is even used on the form to get this petition started.!!      This habit has got that bad, it is even on Samaritan enrolment forms.      If The Government really wants to put the Great back into Britain start showing some respect to all individuals that created it...
